core.messages
Interface CommunicationManager

All Superinterfaces:
LoggerListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
MultipleInboxCommunicationManager, OfflineCommunicationManager, SingleInboxCommunicationManager
public interface CommunicationManager
extends LoggerListener

This interface has the public accesible methods that all implementations of the communicaction managers must implement. A communicacion manager is the element that will handle communication between automatas.

Author:
GelidElf

Method Summary
 void clientDisconnected(CommunicationIds commId)
          This method is called when a client is disconnected, it must implement proper notification, code to wait for client to reconnect, or codeto try to reconnect
 void feed(Message message)
          Places the message in the parameter in the inbox used by the communication manager.
 Inbox getInbox()
          Returns the inbox where this object is storing the messages received
 CommunicationIds getOwner()
          Returns the owner of this Communication element, this should be always the Automata that created the object.
 void initialize()
          This method must contain the initializing code for the manager.
 void sendMessage(Message message)
          This method sends the message to the destination specified on the message
 void setDisconnectInProgress(boolean disconnectInProgress)
          Informs this communicationManager that the disconection proces has started Used in the loops to connect or reconnect
 void setInbox(Inbox inbox)
          Setter for the inbox in this communication manager, used mainly to provide several communication managers with the same shared inbox
 
Methods inherited from interface core.utilities.log.LoggerListener
print, println
 

Method Detail

sendMessage

void sendMessage(Message message)
This method sends the message to the destination specified on the message

Parameters:
message - the message to be sent

getInbox

Inbox getInbox()
Returns the inbox where this object is storing the messages received

Returns:
the inbox for this communication manager

setInbox

void setInbox(Inbox inbox)
Setter for the inbox in this communication manager, used mainly to provide several communication managers with the same shared inbox

Parameters:
inbox - the inbox to be setted

getOwner

CommunicationIds getOwner()
Returns the owner of this Communication element, this should be always the Automata that created the object. This method is used to identify messages for broadcast, identify ownership of received messages, create speciffic behavoiur in the communication manager depending on who is the father

Returns:
the owner of this communication manager

initialize

void initialize()
This method must contain the initializing code for the manager. This usually means, waiting for clients to connect, or trying to connect to the server

feed

void feed(Message message)
Places the message in the parameter in the inbox used by the communication manager.

Parameters:
message - the message to be inserted into the inbox

clientDisconnected

void clientDisconnected(CommunicationIds commId)
This method is called when a client is disconnected, it must implement proper notification, code to wait for client to reconnect, or codeto try to reconnect

Parameters:
commId -

setDisconnectInProgress

void setDisconnectInProgress(boolean disconnectInProgress)
Informs this communicationManager that the disconection proces has started Used in the loops to connect or reconnect

Parameters:
disconnectInProgress -
